analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the triplets, the Paṭṭhāna text in triplets

analyzed: kenacid viññeyya duka sani dassana ttika
translated: The first section for recitation on the visible, etc.

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhamma
translated: With the visible, the invisible, the impingeing, the non-impingeing, etc.🔽With a visible, impingeing, non-cognizable object, a visible, impingeing, cognizable object arises, by way of root-cause condition.

original: paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci🔽viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: paṭicca kenaci na viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kenaci  viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a visible, impingeing, non-cognizable object, a non-visible, impingeing, cognizable object arises, by way of root-cause condition.

original: ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca kenaci na viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With a visible, impingeing, non-cognizable object, a visible, impingeing, cognizable object and a non-visible, impingeing, cognizable object arise, by way of root-cause condition.

original: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
analyzed: na kenacid na viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva
translated: With a non-visible, impingeing, non-cognizable object, only three arise, by way of root-cause condition.

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṁ navapañhaṁ kātabbaṁ. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighamūlassa nava pañhāyeva.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca na kenacid na viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva sabbattha nava  na kenacid viññeyyam na anidassana sappaṭighassa purima sadisam nava pañham na kenacid viññeyyam na anidassana appaṭigha mūlassa nava pañhāya iva
